LanguageData.ResearchProject_QSRCapacityUpgrade_1.des: Increases Quantum Storage cell capacity by 2, up to 6 stacks per cell.
LanguageData.ResearchProject_QSRCapacityUpgrade_2.des: Increases Quantum Storage cell capacity by 2, up to 8 stacks per cell.
LanguageData.ResearchProject_QSRCapacityUpgrade_3.des: Increases Quantum Storage cell capacity by 2, up to 10 stacks per cell.
LanguageData.ResearchProject_QSRCapacityUpgrade_4.des: Increases Quantum Storage cell capacity by 2, up to 12 stacks per cell.
